name: To Survive
description:
To Survive is a zombie apocalypse survival game where players must finish off zombies as rounds progress. They player must clear all rounds to beat the game. The game's difficulty gradually increases as rounds progress. Players must make use of limited amount of ammo and other equipment to either destroy zombies or evade them until all rounds finish.

Players can play co-op with their friends or solo play the game.

This game is a demo experience created by students at Sheridan College in Oakville, Canada. The game is part of semester capstone project made in a 3 months time frame.
